content.rendered:
Co-Managed IT Services:

Empower Your Team with Expert IT Support

Co-managed IT services provides your in-house team with the additional expertise, resources, and support needed to enhance efficiency, improve security, and scale your IT operations seamlessly.

Schedule A Meeting

Does your internal IT team need an extra hand?

  • Without additional support, your internal IT team may become overloaded.
  • Gaps in cybersecurity measures could leave your business vulnerable to costly breaches and data loss.
  • Slow response times and unresolved technical issues can result in downtime, affecting your team’s ability to stay productive.
  • Your internal team might struggle with advanced technical challenges.
  • Without access to the latest technologies and best practices, your company could fall behind competitors.

Co-Managed IT Support

For the past 17 years, we’ve crafted a Proven Process that ensures our clients have a reliable, secure, and efficient technology environment. Our process and systems are rigorously tested through an annual SOC 2 Type 2 audit, placing Snap Tech IT among the top 1% of providers in the industry.

Schedule a meeting today to learn more about our Proven Process and how we can bring value to your business.

Schedule A Meeting

Proven Process

Obtain the results you deserve through our proven process.

Technology Plan

Achieve your goals with a strategic technology plan.

Predictable IT Budget

Plan better and get better ROI on your technology investments. 

IT Strategy & Reporting

Strategy meetings to ensure your technology supports the business.

Managed End User Support

Experience fast, reliable & friendly IT support every time.

Managed Cyber Security

Solutions that provide multiple layers of defense.

Cloud & Infrastructure Management

Ensures your IT systems are optimized, secure, and scalable.

Backup & Disaster Recovery

Safeguards your data and ensures fast recovery & minimizing downtime.

Let us join your team, not replace them.

At Snap Tech IT, our co-managed IT services are designed to complement and enhance your internal IT team, not replace them. We offer a comprehensive suite of tools, processes, and industry-leading solutions that have been successfully implemented across hundreds of client environments.

Our team seamlessly integrates with your IT department, providing access to advanced tools, thorough documentation, and expert support to help your team work more efficiently and effectively. By handling critical tasks such as patch management, cybersecurity, and network monitoring, we free up your internal team to focus on high-value, strategic projects that drive your business forward.

With our partnership, you can ensure that your IT operations run smoothly and securely while maximizing the potential of your in-house talent.

Creating Happy Customers since 2007

Our Purpose is to Create better life experiences for our team, customers, and families.

Are you ready for Co-Managed IT Services?

Schedule a Meeting

We’ll learn about you, your company, and your needs.  We’ll also show you how our Proven Process delivers results.

IT Discovery & Cybersecurity Risk Assessment

We’ll perform a 3rd party deep dive into your technology so you can better understand your company risks.

Achieve Happy & Productive Internal IT Team

Our Co-Managed Services will provide your team with tools, expertise, so they can provide more value for your company.

Schedule A Meeting

Client Case Study

A co-managed IT service relationship enables Covalence Laboratories to boost their cybersecurity posture with advanced zero trust technologies. The Covalence IT team enjoys a smooth working relationship with their outsourced partner, while benefiting from proactive IT maintenance, advanced cybersecurity services, and ongoing strategic IT advice. 

Read More
